title: Remote Utilities 5.6.0.6 Final + Serial
description:
Remote Utilities is remote desktop software for secure access to workstations, servers and laptops over a LAN or over the Internet. You can view the remote PC screen and control its mouse and keyboard as if you were sitting right in front of the PC. 

With Remote Utilities you can provide technical support to your customers, help your friends and family members to perform various tasks on the PC and administer the local network in your organization.

FEATURES: 

-	16 different connection modes including Full Control, View, File Transfer, Task Manager, Command Line, Inventory Manager, Remote Webcam, Text Chat, Send message etc. 
-	Power control: Shut down, Restart, Log off, Turn physical monitor on and off, Wake-on-LAN
-	Firewall Bypass: Easily connect to remote computers behind a firewall/router
-	Active Directory support
-	Built-in MSI configurator and Remote Installation tools
-	Unattended and attended remote support
-	Mobile versions for Android and iOS

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2003/2008/2012 

HOW TO INSTALL: 

1.	Run rut.viewer5.6en.msi on the local PC to install the Viewer module.
2.	Run rut.host5.6en.msi on the remote PC (or multiple PCs) to install the remote Host module.
3.	Connect from the Viewer to the Host using PDF tutorial inside. 

REGISTRATION: 

User the serial inside the zip archive. 

Official website: http://www.remoteutilities.com 

Enjoy!
